thread.title: Marks and Spencer's best-selling £25 bootcut jeans have over 3,000 five-star ratings
thread.title_full: Marks and Spencer's best-selling £25 bootcut jeans have over 3,000 five-star ratings

title: Marks and Spencer's best-selling £25 bootcut jeans have over 3,000 five-star ratings
text:
The Eva Bootcut Jeans from M&S have been praised for their 'comfortable' and 'flattering' fit, but you'll need to be quick to get your hands on a pair Bootcut jeans were last huge in the 90s, but they're making a 2025 comeback, with Marks & Spencer's new pair getting snapped up quickly by shoppers. What makes this £25 denim style so great is its comfortable yet stylish design, plus it won't break the bank.
The Eva Bootcut Jeans have racked up more than 3,000 five-star reviews online, thanks to their effortless fit and feel. This timeless denim style is slim to the knee before flaring out at the ankle to flatter your shape.
The M&S jeans have a supportive high waist, making them great for different body shapes. They're offered in five denim shades, including classic indigo and light washes that will take you into the spring season effortlessly, and there are long, short and regular lengths to choose from.
